backend/main.mo: Main actor implementing admission management system with user profiles, candidate records (including fatherName and admissionID fields), gallery, news, and admin role management with super admin initialization and access control.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that transforms old candidate records (keyed by Principal) to new format (keyed by Text) and adds fatherName and admissionID fields with empty default values.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting three implemented features: father's name field in admission form, printable admission card with unique ID, and admission ID display in admin panel.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files including components, pages, hooks, and configuration files for the admission management system with warm traditional styling.
frontend/index.css: Global CSS with Tailwind layers defining OKLCH color variables for light/dark themes using warm traditional palette, plus print media query optimizations for admission card printing.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for 'Karani Sena Yuva Shakti Website' with root div and module script reference to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring TanStack Router with routes for home, admission form, and protected admin panel, wrapped in ThemeProvider with ProfileSetupModal and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Full-page access denied component with shield icon and return-to-home button for unauthorized admin access attempts.
frontend/src/components/AdminCandidatesL: Admin component displaying candidate submissions in accordion format with prominent admission ID badges, photos, and detailed information including father's name field.
frontend/src/components/AdminGalleryMana: Admin component for managing gallery items with add/delete functionality, image upload, and authorization checks. Displays gallery items in a grid with delete confirmation dialogs and handles admin-only access control.
frontend/src/components/AdminManagementS: Admin management interface for adding/removing admins by principal ID and resetting the admin system. Displays current admin list with badges and provides alert dialogs for destructive actions.
frontend/src/components/AdminNewsManager: Admin component for creating, editing, and deleting news items with a form interface. Displays news items sorted by creation date with edit/delete actions and confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/components/AdmissionCard.ts: Displays a printable admission card with student details, photo, and admission ID. Includes print functionality and formatted layout optimized for both screen and print media.
frontend/src/components/GallerySection.t: Public-facing gallery section that displays photo grid with descriptions. Shows loading skeletons and empty state when no photos are available.
frontend/src/components/ImageUploadField: Reusable image upload component with drag-and-drop support, preview, progress tracking, and file validation. Converts uploaded files to ExternalBlob format with size and type restrictions.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main layout component with responsive navigation header, mobile menu toggle, and authentication controls (login/logout) using Internet Identity. Includes links to Home, Admission Form, and Admin pages with conditional rendering based on auth state.
frontend/src/components/NewsSection.tsx: Displays a grid of news items sorted by creation date, with loading skeletons and empty state handling. Fetches news data using useGetAllNewsItems hook and renders cards with title, date, and content.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal dialog that prompts authenticated users without a profile to enter their name. Appears automatically after login and saves the profile using useSaveCallerUserProfile hook.
frontend/src/components/ProtectedRoute.t: Route guard component that checks authentication and admin status, automatically initializes super admin if needed, and shows access denied screen for unauthorized users. Displays loading spinner during checks.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance with authentication, automatically recreating it when identity changes and invalidating dependent queries. Handles both authenticated and anonymous actors.
frontend/src/hooks/useAddAdmin.ts: Mutation hook to add a new admin by principal ID, invalidating the admins query cache on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useAddGalleryItem.ts: Mutation hook to add a gallery item with image blob and description, with error handling and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateNewsItem.ts: Mutation hook to create a news item with title, content, and timestamp, invalidating news items cache on success.
Mutation hook to delete a gallery item by description, invalidating gallery items cache on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useDeleteNewsItem.ts: Mutation hook to delete a news item by title, invalidating news items cache on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useEditNewsItem.ts: Mutation hook to edit an existing news item's content and timestamp, invalidating news items cache on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useGetAdmins.ts: Query hook to fetch list of admin users, enabled only when actor is ready and user is authenticated.
frontend/src/hooks/useGetAllCandidates.t: Query hook to fetch all admission candidates, enabled only when actor is ready and user is authenticated.
frontend/src/hooks/useGetAllNewsItems.ts: Query hook to fetch all news items, enabled when actor is ready (no authentication required).
frontend/src/hooks/useGetCallerUserProfi: Query hook to fetch the current authenticated user's profile, returning null if no profile exists. Includes custom loading state handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useGetGalleryItems.ts: Query hook to fetch all gallery items, enabled when actor is ready (no authentication required).
frontend/src/hooks/useInitializeSuperAdm: Mutation hook to initialize the first super admin, invalidating admin-related queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsCallerAdmin.ts: React Query hook that checks if the current authenticated user is an admin by calling the backend actor's isCallerAdmin method.
frontend/src/hooks/useRemoveAdmin.ts: React Query mutation hook for removing an admin by principal, invalidating the admins query cache on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useResetAdminSystem.t: React Query mutation hook that forcefully resets the admin system and invalidates both admins and isCallerAdmin query caches.
frontend/src/hooks/useSaveCallerUserProf: React Query mutation hook for saving the current user's profile, invalidating the currentUserProfile query cache on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitAdmissionFor: React Query mutation hook that submits an admission form with candidate details and photo, then retrieves and returns the newly created admission ID.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom OKLCH color palette (saffron, red, gold theme), dark mode support, fade-in animations, and print styles for admission cards.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client and Internet Identity provider, then renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanel.tsx: Admin dashboard page with sidebar navigation for managing admission applications, photo gallery, news updates, and administrator accounts.
frontend/src/pages/AdmissionFormPage.tsx: Admission form page that collects candidate information and photo, submits to backend, and displays a printable admission card upon successful submission.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page with hero section featuring organization branding, call-to-action buttons for admission, and sections for gallery and news content.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and managing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support and functions to clear sensitive parameters from URLs.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom theme extensions including OKLCH color system, container queries, typography plugin, custom animations (accordion, fade-in), and warm shadow utilities.
project_state.json: Project state document describing a Karani Sena Yuva Shakti organization website with public admission forms, Internet Identity-protected admin panel with sidebar navigation, photo gallery, news management, and multi-admin role-based access control.
